EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1560437089.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1560437089.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning Louisa,
I hope all is well and thanks so much for your time on the phone with me. I am your Account Manager with Grand & Toy so please let me know if there are any business needs you may have as I can assist. I will send you a calendar invitation for Wednesday July 10th at 3:30 PM to do an account review, ensure what we have is meeting your business needs and update the contacts we currently have on file. Should anything come up let me know; otherwise, I am looking forward to our conversation. In the meantime, please reach out if I can be of assistance. Thank you again for your time and I hope you're having a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
http://grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.​
